data.title: Winners Automotive Innovation Award!
data.meta_description: We are thrilled to announce that we won the Student Award from Stichting Automotive Innovation Award for our exceptional work in developing the Next Generat
data.text:
We are thrilled to announce that we won the Student Award from Stichting Automotive Innovation Award for our exceptional work in developing the Next Generation Battery Pack, showcasing our ability to make a substantial and pertinent impact as students!

Utilizing our cell-level cooling technology and high-performance battery cells from DESTEN Inc., we successfully engineered a battery pack that boasts outstanding performance and an incredibly low charging time of 03:56 minutes.

In the words of former Minister President Jan Peter Balkenende, "As a small country, we can have a large and global impact with our innovations." This sentiment holds true for our small but dedicated team, continuously achieving significant improvements. We take great pride in our entire team for this remarkable accomplishment!

The awards ceremony was a captivating evening, highlighting various companies and organizations in the automotive industry committed to advancing innovations in sustainability, safety, and accessibility. Congratulations are in order for the other Award winners TomTom, LeydenJar, and Total Safety Solutions.

We express our sincere gratitude to Stichting Automotive Innovation Award for the invitation and their warm hospitality.

Lastly, we extend our appreciation to our fellow nominees and fellow students in our category, including Team Polar and TU/ecomotive. Their outstanding achievements in the automotive industry exemplify the culture of continuous innovation at Eindhoven University of Technology!
